title: The Al Faris Community Center: A Legacy of Service & Hope

featured_image.alt_text: Faris Suhil Abuzahra in a white lab coat, honoring his legacy at Al Faris Community Center

contents.body: In the heart of Madale, Tanzania, 30 km from Dar es Salaam, stands a beacon of hope and community: the Al Faris Community Center. As one of the most impactful * community centers in Tanzania *, it encompasses 150 square meters and is more than just a building—it is a testament to the power of giving and the enduring legacy of one young man life.

The Abuzahra family established the Al Faris Community Center in memory of their beloved son, Faris Suhil, who tragically passed away at just 25 years old. With its mosque, school, and artesian water well, the center meets the spiritual and physical needs of over 2,000 residents in the local area.

Faris was a kind-hearted and dedicated soul, known for his work with the homeless and disadvantaged in Rutherford County and his commitment to his studies at the University of Tennessee Health Science Center, where he was pursuing a doctorate in pharmacology. Those who knew him remember his kindness, humility, and tireless spirit of service. His life was one filled with gratitude and resilience—qualities that live on in this shining example of * charity projects Africa * can be proud of.
In just a few days, the Al Faris School, a dedicated academy for Quranic education, will open its doors to hundreds of eager students, serving the community for generations to come.

The Abuzahra family has brought Faris legacy to life in Madale, Tanzania, where thousands will gather for worship, learning, and community. By replacing the old mosque with this thriving center, the family has created a beautiful space that will serve future generations, ensuring that Faris’s spirit of generosity and dedication continues to impact lives far and wide, as a shining example of * community centers in Tanzania * that uplift and inspire.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to the Abuzahra family for their strength and generosity, and we are grateful to be part of their healing. May the Al Faris Community Center bring peace and prosperity to the people of Madale.

You, too, can partner with ARCD to leave a charitable legacy for you and your loved ones while helping a community thrive. For more information, contact our Donor Care team at info@arcdus.org or 1-855-273-6628.
